scripts.setup:backend: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "python -m venv backend\.venv; backend\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip; backend\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r backend\requirements.txt"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c cyan,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
